availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ohio, resident. Ohio native. Married to Adam J. Surface in Preble County, Ohio, in September 1840. Mother of Andrew J. Surface, Lucinda Surface, Noah Surface, Huldah Surface, Susana Surface, Jacob Surface, Rhoda Surface, and Amanda Surface. Resident of Cass County, Indiana, in 1860. Resident of Ohio in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Indiana, Cass County, Tipton Township, p. 594.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Ohio, Preble County, Monroe Township, p. 180A.
"Sarah J. 'Sally' Irick Surface (1815-1900)," Find A Grave, Memorial 24738210, accessed November 15, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/24738210.
KYR-0001-006-0073.
